page.title: 16Notes on the background
page.content: The meaning of names of immediately adjoining areas which Daniel has traced remain applicable today:Rodley, meadow in the reeds,still has reed- fringed lanes winding between pasture land and Hayden,hay on a hill ( old word Haydown ), is a small area of undulating land supporting hayfields. Richard's home,a house on the bank of the river,has a special upstairs window looking over the water which is known as the smugglers' window because of stories of its use. Several of the children at our school are cousins:complicated net- works of family relationship abound among the long-established residents. There are also recently-arrived people who on the whole have to travel out of the immediate area to work.Old or new, the commitment to the community shows and is of great benefit to it.
